a mixed grill of bacon, sausages, tomatoes and mushrooms
sentences.cn: 由咸熏肉、香肠、番茄和蘑菇做成的烤杂排

sentences.en: Bacon has streaks of fat and streaks of lean.
sentences.cn: 咸肉中有几层肥的和几层瘦的.

sentences.en: Cook the bacon until it begins to crisp.
Discard the bacon rind and cut each rasher in half.
sentences.cn: 去掉熏肉的外皮，再把每一片熏肉切成两半。

sentences.en: I have to go to work because it brings home the bacon.
sentences.cn: 我得去工作，因为它能使我赚钱糊口。

sentences.en: She carried a piping hot grill of oysters and bacon.
sentences.cn: 她端出一盘滚烫的烤牡蛎和咸肉.

sentences.en: She knows many anecdotes of Bacon.
sentences.cn: 她知道许多有关培根的轶事.

sentences.en: She tucked into a breakfast of bacon and eggs.
sentences.cn: 她大口地吃着咸肉和鸡蛋作成的早餐。

sentences.en: This bacon is too salty for me.
sentences.cn: 这块熏咸猪肉我觉得太咸了.

sentences.en: Who brings up the baby and who brings home the bacon?
sentences.cn: 是谁抚养孩子的，是谁赚钱养家的？

sentences.en: Your mother once saved my bacon. She lent me money when I needed it.
sentences.cn: 你母亲帮过我一次大忙，在我需要的时候借过钱给我。
